      • solve

        public boolean solve(DataStore ds,
                     ModelFunction mf,
                     double[] a_ini,
                     double[] a_err_ini,
                     boolean[] a_use)
        Solve the fitting problem.
        Specified by:
        solve in interface FitSolver
        Parameters:
        ds - The data for fitting.
        a_ini - The initial values of the parameters.
        a_err_ini - The parameter values' errors.
        a_use - The mask array specifying if the parameter will be used in fitting.
        mf - The model function
        Returns:
        The boolean value specifying success of fitting.
